s1.title: CVS details
s1.p: Our CVS repository is mounted at SourceForge.

See SourceForge's page for CVS configuration details. There are multiple modules. See page for the module names. They will all have to be placed relatively next to each other in a directory for building to work. We use Ant (see below) to build the apps.

s1.title: A word about Ant
s1.p: Jesktop uses Ant for a platform neutral building. What doesn't nowadays? It wants to use it's own ant, not the one you may have installed. As such it needs two things from you before starting:

ol.li: Environmental variable JAVA_HOME set to the correct directory. Sun describe this in their Java installation procedures.
Environmental variable PATH to have JAVA_HOME/bin as one of it's colon or semi colon separated entries.
